title: Woman 'accidentally kidnapped' when motorcyclist closes garage's automatic doors
text:
A woman was swept underneath a closing garage door and left trapped inside a building in hilarious footage that shows an apparent case of 'accidental kidnapping'.

A CCTV clip, believed to have been taken in Goiânia, Brazil, begins with a motorcyclist riding out of his garage and waiting for a car to pass.

The biker then activates the garage door's automatic close function - just as a woman passes underneath.

The closing door sweeps the passer-by into the building as the motorcycle speeds away, presumably leaving the woman stranded inside.

Not seeming to have noticed the woman being scooped into the garage, the motorcyclist drives away just before the footage comes to an end.

The woman's daughter, Thaís Oliveira, said she was trapped in the garage for around one hour before she was saved by a woman who swept the pavement in the same area, Brazilian news outlet BHAZ reported.

The video was posted on Facebook by Brazilian user Gleysson Lima, who said: 'Hope the guy comes back soon.'

Follow-up footage, uploaded on Twitter, shows the woman knock on the inside of the garage door and seemingly plead with the camera inside.

One commenter said: 'Poor thing! The lady. More she should pay more attention. Very distracted.'

Janio Farias said: 'What a trip hahaha very good.'

The clip was also posted on Reddit, where one commenter said: 'The woman gave up too easily.'

Another said: 'I hate slow walkers, finally something is being done.'

A third said: 'It’s not kidnapping, it’s surprise adoption.'

One Reddit user said: 'What I don't get is why the biker would drive out on the lane and then stop while closing the garage door.'

Another responded: 'It looks like he rolled out, stopped to check traffic, then looked down to check something on the bike (maybe make sure the neutral light was on, cause he was going to have to release the clutch), and then had to take both hands off the handlebars to get the door remote out of his pocket.'
description: CCTV footage, believed to have been taken in Brazil, shows a motorcyclist riding out of a building and activating his garage door - which then sweeps a passing woman inside.
